title: A Skadden veteran's uneasy take on smarter machines
full_text: A Skadden veteran's uneasy take on smarter machines. A "brick wall" moment changed his career. He wants younger generations to get that chance, too.. Three years out of law school, in 1990, David Goldschmidt landed the kind of assignment most young corporate lawyers only dream of: taking a company public. When a senior partner at the venerated Ne… [+8012 chars]
